attributes.action: urgently review, and have amended, the current “Whistle Blowing Legislation”
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make “Whistle Blowing Legislation” fit for purpose, give true protection to individuals who bring failures of employers to the attention of the public and others.  The Prime Minister should also intercede on behalf of the nurse who was struck off after she secretly filmed the neglect of patients, arrange for a review of how the NHS  and other government department deals with whistleblowers.
